definition: (of garments) against the skin/to line/lining/to contrast with/to assist financially

li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels

sentences.english: Care must be taken to completely seal entrance plugs(eg. at a manway)in refractory linings.
sentences.chinese: 必须小心地完全封闭耐火材料衬里的进口门。

sentences.english: The lining structure at the linked position between inclined pipe and regenerator was improved.
sentences.chinese: 对斜管与再生器相贯线部位的衬里结构进行了改进。

sentences.english: Soft leather lining wicks away moisture leaving the foot cool and dry.
sentences.chinese: 排湿离开脚下的阴凉，干燥的软皮衬里。

sentences.english: Fully lined with genuine deerskin for plush, ultra soft comfort around the foot.
sentences.chinese: 全衬里真正的鹿皮毛绒，左右脚超柔软舒适。

sentences.english: Thermal fleece lining with a spun-wool sock to keep your toes nice and cozy.
sentences.chinese: 热与纺羊毛袜，保持你的脚趾美好而舒适的羊毛衬里。

sentences.english: Soft and comfy cable knit cotton coat with fleece lining.
sentences.chinese: 柔软舒适电缆羊毛衬里针织棉大衣。

sentences.english: These cartons are well protected against moisture by plastic lining.
sentences.chinese: 这些纸盒内有塑料衬里，防潮性能很好。

sentences.english: Good quality full-grain pigskin glove, unlined, cotton back, cuff.
sentences.chinese: 高品质全粒面猪皮线背手套，无衬里，袖套。

sentences.english: My coat is lined with silk.
sentences.chinese: 我这件外衣是用绸子做的衬里。

sentences.english: The old fur coat must be relined.
sentences.chinese: 这件旧的皮毛大衣必须换衬里。

sentences.english: Clip fastening part of headliner in rear area.
sentences.chinese: 卡入车顶衬里后面区域的紧固件。

sentences.english: Slip-on style with synthetic lining provides a secure, easy fit for fashion on the go.
sentences.chinese: 上滑式合成衬里提供一个安全，适合去容易为时尚。

sentences.english: The Synoviocytes form a distinct structure called the synovial lining layer.
sentences.chinese: 滑膜细胞形成被称为滑膜衬里层的特殊结构。

sentences.english: Highly breathable, moisture-absorbent leather lining keeps feet feeling fresh all day long.
sentences.chinese: 高透气，吸湿皮革衬里，让脚感觉清爽整天。

sentences.english: Leather lining and cushioned footbed for all-day support.
sentences.chinese: 皮革衬里和垫鞋垫全天支持。

sentences.english: They whispered to one another about the taffeta lining and about little mouse tippets.
sentences.chinese: 切切私语着塔夫绸的衬里还有关于老鼠的小披肩。

definition: a buckle or fastener for clothing that does not use a button and buttonhole (e.g. the buckle on metal wristwatches)
